resources.string: In the classic Breakout game, you will control a paddle to prevent a ball from going pass it. Ball is bounced off paddle to destroy blocks. Player is scored based on time taken to destroy all blocks.
In Challenge mode, you can challenge 3 interesting local levels. If these are too easy for you, then You can choose to download 3 more difficult levels from the server.
There is no end in Arcade Mode. You will challenge yourself against inifite blocks for getting higher score. When you get a high score, you can upload it to the server to get ranked.
The ball will bounce back when it collides with other objects and it will remove the block when collision occurs. You can lauch the ball by simply touching the paddle.
You can control the paddle to prevent the ball from dropping by moving it with your finger.
You will get 5 scores as reward when it was removed from the screen.
You will get 5 scores and one extra life as reward when it was removed from the screen.
You will get 5 scores and a larger paddle as reward when it was removed from the screen.
